answers.answer: PVCs are a harmless but anxiety causing problem.  In the normal heart they are harmless.  But for myself they cause extreme anxiety.  They are not caused by a virus.  They can just happen for any reason.  I have been told that most of the population has them but only some people can actually feel them.  They cause huge anxiety for me too.

question: HiMy Q is I have been suffering from PVC since jan 2007. No medical hx of cardiac problem, Cardilite test negative, Echocardioharm neg, 24 holters , 2,100 PVC. Taking Rithmol med 326 q.12. Magnesium 2 ab daily. No cholesterol No diabetes, Does my problem could be related to a virus or other type of infection. Right now my doctor hasnt find the cause.
title: Heart PVC
